item.title: 1273 BMY
item.description: score:1273 Chances: Institutions’ substantial holdings in Bristol-Myers Squibb imply significant influence on the stock. Merck’s stronger-than-expected second-quarter earnings may signal positive prospects for the pharmaceutical sector. Bristol-Myers Squibb’s earnings and revenue surprises for Q2 2023 could provide insights into the stock’s future performance.
